thread.title: Win a signed copy of May Martin's Sewing Bible
thread.title_full: Win a signed copy of May Martin's Sewing Bible - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win a signed copy of May Martin's Sewing Bible
text: To celebrate the upcoming Sew Saturday event, Telegraph readers can enter to win one of three signed copies of May Martin's Sewing Bible. Sew Saturday is a celebration of independent fabric stores and haberdashers, taking place on Saturday, October 17, 2015, launched by Sew magazine. With appearances from leading names, including BBC2's The Great British Sewing Bee stars, plus workshops, free makes and takes, discounts and competitions happening up and down the country, it's set to be a day to remember. You can pay a visit to your local shop to enjoy the dayâ€™s events.To see an A-Z of participating stores, click here You can also check out the interactive map here to find the store closest to you. Use the hashtag #sewsaturday to share your experiences on social media. How to enter For your chance to win, simply click here and enter your details online. telegraph.co.uk
